text: Ani amhi pratyeka janasamuhata paigambara pathavile ki (loka ho!) Kevala allahaci upasana kara ani taguta (allahakherijaci sarva asatya upasye) pasuna dura raha, tara kahi lokanna allahane margadarsana pradana kele ani kahinvara margabhrastata sid'dha jhali. Ata tumhi svatah dharativara hinduna phiruna paha ki khote tharavinaryanca sevata kasa jhala
